generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic signals, which is clearly designated for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building and bicycle lane.
- building: A commercial building with large signage ("BAUHAUS") is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible alongside the road and near the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle qualifies as a rider.
- car: A black car is visible in the left lane, and a white car is visible ahead in the center lane.
- truck: A green truck is visible parked near the building on the right side.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead and on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and warning signs near the intersection.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible along the right side of the road, near the building.
